```{css}
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  background-color: white;
  font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
}

/* We do not have a table of content so we can use the full width instead of 75% */
.col-md-9 {
  width: 100%;
}

a {
  color: #0079C3;
    text-decoration: none;
  
}

a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

span {
  font-size:	14px;
  margin: 0;
  margin-bottom:6px;
}

p {
  
  font-family: 'PT Serif', serif;
  font-size:14px;
  color: #767676;
    margin:0;
  margin-right:24px;
  
}

h1 {
  font-size:48px;
  margin: 12px 0;
}


h2 {
  font-size:16px;
  margin: 0 12px 6px 0;
  
}

.timeline h2 {
  padding-top: 0;
  margin-top: 0;
}


.right h2 {
  
  margin-right: 0px;
  margin-left: 12px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight:400;
  color:#212121;
    
}

/* The actual timeline (the vertical ruler) */
.timeline {
  display:block;
  position: relative;
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 120px auto;
  
}

/* The actual timeline (the vertical ruler) */
.timeline::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 2px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 75%;
  
}

/* Container around content */
.container_tl {
  position: relative;
  background-color: inherit;
  /* display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: auto auto; */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  margin-bottom:24px
  
}

/* Place the container to the left */
.left {
  left: 0;
}

/* Place the container to the right */
.right {
  left: 75%;
}


/* The actual content */
.content {
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  
}

.connector {
  /* grid-column: 2 / span 1; */
  /* width: 100%; */
  border-bottom: 1px solid grey;
  height: 14px;
  min-width: 100px;
  flex-grow: 1;
  
}

.container_tl.left {
  
  width: 75%;
  
}

/* The circles on the timeline */
.left .connector::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  right: -6px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 8px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1;
}


/* The circles on the timeline */
.right .connector::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  left: -4px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 8px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1;
}

.container_tl.right {
  width: 25%;
}

.container_tl.right .connector {
  
  width: 100px;
  flex-grow: 0;
  
}

/* styling for the month markers on the timeline */
.month-marker {
  display:inline-block;
  position: relative;
  z-index:1000;
  left:75%;
  margin-left:-35px;
  background-color:#212121;
    color:white;
  height:24px;
  border-radius:2px;
  margin-bottom:24px;
}

.month-marker span {
  margin:4px 8px;
}


/* position and style the date markers */
span.date {
  align-self: flex-end;
  font-size:12px;
  color:#767676;
    margin:0 12px -6px;
}

/* move the dates on key events to the left */
.right span.date {
  align-self:flex-start;
}

/* Media queries - Responsive timeline on screens less than 730px wide */
  @media screen and (max-width: 730px) {
    
    /* hide the timeline */
    .timeline::after {
      display:none
    }
    
    /* Full-width containers */
    .container_tl.left {
      width: 100%;
      padding:12px;
      left: 0;
    }
  
    /*hide the connectors */
    .connector {
      display: none;
      
    }
    
    /* hide the dots */
    .connector::before, .connector::after {
      display: none;
    }
  
    
    .container_tl.right {
      
      padding:12px;
      text-align: right;
      width: 75%;
      left: 20%;
    }
    
    .container_tl.right h2 {
      width: 100%;
    }
    
    .content {
      width: 100%;
    }
    
  }
```


```{r}
library(jsonlite)

df <- fromJSON("../data.json")
df$publicationDate <- as.Date(df$publicationDate)
```

# Covid Preprints

## A timeline of landmark preprints in response to COVID-19.

```{r, results='asis'}
cat('<div class="timeline">')

month <- "init"

for (i in seq_len(nrow(df))) {
  
  new_month <- format(df[i, "publicationDate"], "%b %Y")
  
  if (new_month != month) {
    cat('<div class="month-marker">')
    cat('<span>', new_month, '</span>')
    cat('</div>')
    month <- new_month
  }
  
  if (df[i, "class"] == "preprint") {
    cat('<div class="container_tl left">')
    cat('<span class="date">', sprintf("%sth", format(df[i, "publicationDate"], "%e")), '</span>')
    cat('<div class="content">')
    cat('<h2><a href=', df[i, "url"], '>', df[i, "title"], '</a></h2>')
    cat('<div class="connector"></div>')
    cat('</div>')
    cat('<span class="author-name">', df[i, "authorString"], '</span>')
    cat('<p>', df[i, "briefSummary"], '</p>')
    cat('</div>')
  } else if (df[i, "class"] == "event") {
    cat('<div class="container_tl right">')
    cat('<span class="date">', sprintf("%sth", format(df[i, "publicationDate"], "%e")), '</span>')
    cat('<div class="content">')
    cat('<div class="connector"></div>')
    cat('<h2><a href=', df[i, "url"], '>', df[i, "title"], '</a></h2>')
    cat('</div>')
    cat('</div>')
  }

}

cat('</div>')
```
